nodes.text: Fleet Support Air Station was located on the Mid Rim planet Ord Mantell as an auxiliary of Fleet Support and was in service by the Galactic Republic's Grand Army during the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems in 22 BBY. About three months after the First Battle of Geonosis, the station contained a Nar Shaddaa agri-utility crop sprayer in Docking Bay D-768, which was used by the clone commandos of Omega Squad on their mission to apprehend Separatist scientist Ovolot Qail Uthan on the nearby world Qiilura.
Fleet Support Air Station appeared in the 2004 novel Republic Commando: Hard Contact by Karen Traviss.
